00033 class FeatureIndexSorter {
00034    public:
00038       FeatureIndexSorter( const TileMap* theMap ) : m_map( theMap ) {}
00039        
00044       static int getFeatureImportance( int featureType ) {
00045          switch ( featureType ) {
00046             // Route features.
00047             case ( TileFeature::route_origin ) :
00048                return -3;
00049             case ( TileFeature::route_destination ) :
00050                return -2;
00051             case ( TileFeature::route_park_car ) :
00052                return -1;
00053 
00054             // The least important road features should be drawn below
00055             // the more important ones.
00056             case ( TileFeature::street_class_4_level_0 ) :
00057                return 20;
00058             case ( TileFeature::street_class_4 ) :
00059                return 21;
00060             case ( TileFeature::street_class_3_level_0 ) :
00061                return 22;
00062             case ( TileFeature::street_class_3 ) :
00063                return 23;
00064             case ( TileFeature::street_class_2_level_0 ) :
00065                return 24;
00066             case ( TileFeature::street_class_2_ramp ) :
00067                return 25;
00068             case ( TileFeature::street_class_2 ) :
00069                return 26;
00070             case ( TileFeature::street_class_1_level_0 ) :
00071                return 27;
00072             case ( TileFeature::street_class_1_ramp ) :
00073                return 28;
00074             case ( TileFeature::street_class_1 ) :
00075                return 29;
00076             case ( TileFeature::street_class_0_level_0 ) :
00077                return 30;
00078             case ( TileFeature::street_class_0_ramp ) :
00079                return 31;
00080             case ( TileFeature::street_class_0 ) :
00081                return 32;
00082                
00083             // Citycenters.
00084             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_2 ) :
00085                return 50;
00086             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_4 ) :
00087                return 51;
00088             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_5 ) :
00089                return 52;
00090             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_7 ) :
00091                return 53;
00092             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_8 ) :
00093                return 54;
00094             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_10 ) :
00095                return 55;
00096             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_11 ) :
00097                return 56;
00098             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_12 ) :
00099                return 57;
00100             // Other POI:s
00101             case ( TileFeature::airport ) :
00102                return 60;
00103             case ( TileFeature::church ) :
00104                return 61;
00105             case ( TileFeature::tourist_attraction ) :
00106                return 62;
00107             case ( TileFeature::railway_station ) :
00108                return 63;
00109             case ( TileFeature::commuter_railstation ) :
00110                return 64;
00111             case ( TileFeature::bus_station ) :
00112                return 65;
00113             case ( TileFeature::petrol_station ) :
00114                return 66;
00115             case ( TileFeature::tourist_office ) :
00116                return 67;
00117             case ( TileFeature::hospital ) :
00118                return 68;
00119             // The rest.
00120             default :
00121                // We want to sort the features on feature type so that
00122                // the transferred tilemaps will be smaller.
00123                return featureType + 1000;
00124          }
00125       }
00126       
00130       bool operator() ( int a, int b ) const {
00131          // Check that everything is in order.
00132          MC2_ASSERT( m_map != NULL );
00133          MC2_ASSERT( m_map->getFeature( a ) != NULL );
00134          MC2_ASSERT( m_map->getFeature( b ) != NULL );
00135          
00136          // Get the features.   
00137          const TileFeature* aFeature = m_map->getFeature( a );
00138          const TileFeature* bFeature = m_map->getFeature( b );
00139          
00140          // Get the feature types.
00141          int aType = aFeature->getType();
00142          int bType = bFeature->getType();
00143         
00144          if ( aType != bType ) {
00145             mc2dbg8 << "Feature types: " << aType << ":" << bType << endl;
00146             return (getFeatureImportance( aType ) < 
00147                    getFeatureImportance( bType ));
00148          } 
00149 
00150          // Same type. Sort on image_name argument if present. 
00151          const StringArg* aImageName = 
00152             static_cast<const StringArg*> (
00153                aFeature->getArg( TileArgNames::image_name ) );
00154          const StringArg* bImageName = 
00155             static_cast<const StringArg*> (
00156                bFeature->getArg( TileArgNames::image_name ) );
00157          if ( aImageName != NULL && bImageName != NULL ) {
00158             return aImageName->getValue() < bImageName->getValue();
00159          }
00160          
00161          // Did not contain an image_name arg. 
00162          // The features are considered equal.
00163          return false;
00164       }
00165       
00166    private:
00170       const TileMap* m_map;
00171 };

00265 // --- Inlined methods ---

00267 inline uint32 
00268 WritableTileMap::add( TileFeature* feature ) 
00269 {
00270    MC2_ASSERT( feature == &m_features[ m_lastFeature ] );
00271    return m_lastFeature++;
00272 }
00273 
00274 inline void 
00275 WritableTileMap::addName( uint32 featureIndex, const char* name ) 
00276 {    
00277    MC2SimpleString str( name );
00278 
00279    uint32 strIdx = 0;
00280    map<MC2SimpleString, uint32>::const_iterator it = 
00281       m_strIdxByStrMap.find( str );
00282    if ( it != m_strIdxByStrMap.end() ) {
00283       // Already present among the strings.
00284       strIdx = it->second;
00285    } else {
00286       // Not present, so add it.
00287       strIdx = m_strings.size();
00288       m_strIdxByStrMap.insert( make_pair( str, strIdx ) );
00289       m_strings.push_back( str );
00290    }
00291    
00292    m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap.insert( make_pair( featureIndex, strIdx ) );
00293    
00294 }
00295 
00296 inline void
00297 WritableTileMap::addCategory( uint32 featureIndex, uint16 category ) {
00298 
00299    m_categoryByFeatureIdxMap.
00300       insert( make_pair( featureIndex, category ) );
00301 }
00302 inline void
00303 WritableTileMap::addExtendedString( const ExtendedTileString& string ) {
00304    m_writableExtendedStrings[ string.getFeatureIndex() ].
00305       push_back( string );
00306 }
00307 
00308 inline void
00309 WritableTileMap::complete( bool sort )
00310 {
00311    // Everything is added to the map now.
00312 
00313    // Resize the vector and set the default string index to -1 (no string).
00314 
00315    m_strIdxByFeatureIdx.resize( m_features.size(), -1 );
00316    
00317    // Sort the features and strings.
00318    vector<int> featureIndexVec( m_features.size() );
00319    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < featureIndexVec.size(); ++i ) {
00320       featureIndexVec[ i ] = i;
00321    }
00322    if ( sort ) {
00323       FeatureIndexSorter featureIndexSorter( this );
00324        std::sort( featureIndexVec.begin(), featureIndexVec.end(),
00325                   featureIndexSorter );
00326    }
00327    
00328    vector<TileFeature> oldFeatures( m_features.size() );
00329    m_features.swap( oldFeatures );
00330    m_poiCategoryMap.clear();
00331    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < featureIndexVec.size(); ++i ) {
00332       // i is the new index.
00333       const int oldIndex = featureIndexVec[ i ];
00334       // Check if feature i has a string.
00335       map<uint32,uint32>::const_iterator findIt = 
00336          m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap.find( oldIndex );
00337       if ( findIt != m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap.end() ) {
00338          int strIdx = findIt->second;
00339          m_strIdxByFeatureIdx[ i ] = strIdx;
00340          m_featureIdxInTextOrder.push_back( i );
00341       }
00342       map<uint32, uint16>::const_iterator catIt = 
00343          m_categoryByFeatureIdxMap.find( oldIndex );
00344       if ( catIt != m_categoryByFeatureIdxMap.end() ) {
00345          m_poiCategoryMap.push_back( make_pair( i, catIt->second ) );
00346       }
00347       m_features[ i ] = oldFeatures[ oldIndex ];
00348       // Avoid that the args are deleted when the oldfeatures are 
00349       // destructed since the assignment operator 
00350       // only copies the arg pointers.
00351       oldFeatures[ oldIndex ].m_args.clear();
00352 
00353       // setup extended string table
00354 
00355       map<uint32, ExtendedStringTable >::const_iterator
00356          extStringIt = m_writableExtendedStrings.find( oldIndex );
00357       if ( extStringIt != m_writableExtendedStrings.end() ) {
00358          ExtendedStringTable::const_iterator estrIdx =
00359             extStringIt->second.begin();
00360          for ( ; estrIdx != extStringIt->second.end(); ++estrIdx ) {
00361             m_extendedStrings.
00362                push_back( ExtendedTileString( i, // real feature index
00363                                               estrIdx->getType(),
00364                                               estrIdx->getData() ) );
00365          }
00366       }
00367    }
00368 }
00369 
00370 inline void
00371 WritableTileMap::nbrNotAddedFeatures( int nbrNotAddedFeatures ) {
00372    m_features.resize( m_features.size() - nbrNotAddedFeatures );
00373 }
